name: Jesus and the Minisciples
description:
***Ahora también en español!***

Follow Jesus and his Minisciples in this unique fishing puzzler for the whole family.

-Original character designs
-Casual swipe and release fishing
-Over 50 fun and challenging levels
-Fun short stories highlighting Jesus!

Follow Jesus and fall in love with Him all over again!

-------

Sigue a Jesús y sus Minicípulos una aventura para toda la familia.

-Personajes originales
-Controles sencillos
-Mas de 50 niveles
-Historias Cristo-centricas!

Sigue a Jesús y enamórate de el una ves mas!
